skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Only the best-greatest warriors can learn these techniques.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: I tell you where to shoot-throw, you do as I say, yes!

effects.description:
Missile strength: +2% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +4% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: From last job with man-things. Won't miss them.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +2% to Gutter Runners and Night Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Ammunition: +4% to Gutter Runners and Night Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Ammunition: +8% to Gutter Runners and Night Runners units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Learned in the far-east. Watch, and do as I do!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +2% for Death Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +4% for Death Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Death Runners units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Honored by Lord Sneek, yes-yes!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 for Death Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +2 for Death Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +4 for Death Runners units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: I distract, you stab-strike.
Council of Thirteen directs me-me.
Can't hit what you can't see-see.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: Always another blade.
We keep moving! Eat those that can't keep up.
A rat that lives close to the flame leads a short life.
A nice warning-threat, to keep away the fools-fools. Of course, will need more heads to make more.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(own characters in region)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +6% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.
Always watching.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(own characters in region)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

items.colour_text: Vicious and foul-tempered - the result of a hideous experiment whereby Skaven were crossed with Kislevite Wolves. Very nasty. Best avoid stroking it…

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"
"When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +50% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

Armour-piercing missile damage: +3 for Plague Claw Catapult, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

Construction cost: -10% for Engineering buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(own armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +25%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty

Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Clan Eshin's assassins are the deadliest in the known world. None are beyond their reach.

nodes.localised_description: We are so brave that we can't even come close to each other!
